result.purpose: This project is a microservices-based application that provides authentication and user management services. It aims to facilitate secure user access and management through dedicated services.
result.architecture: The project follows a microservices architecture pattern, with separate services for authentication and user management, each implemented as an HTTP server.

services/auth-service.purpose: Auth service handles authentication and authorization
services/auth-service.architecture: The folder follows a microservices architecture pattern, focusing on handling authentication and authorization through an HTTP server.

services/auth-service/main.go.purpose: Auth service handles authentication and authorization
side_effects: Starts an HTTP server on port 3002
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive token information

services/user-service.architecture: The folder follows a microservices architecture pattern, focusing on user management with a web server implementation.

side_effects: starts a web server on port 3001

result.summary: This project is designed to manage user authentication and user-related operations through dedicated microservices. It helps achieve secure access control and efficient user management in applications.
